short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Starts a new email letter to a selected email address on the page using your default Mail App.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How does it work?
Select an email address on the page, use the context menu (right mouse click), and select the menu item "Mail to ..." to start a new email to the selected address. 

The extension operates solely within your browser and does not require sending or receiving any information.
